QuestData.Title: To Darnassus
QuestData.Description: Everyone in Dolanaar is so proud of Sister Aquinne. I'm certain she'll be pleased to receive this thoughtful gift from Nyoma.$B$BWhen you're ready to travel to Darnassus, just speak to me again and for a few coins, you can hire a hippogryph to take you there. I'm told Sister Aquinne enjoys the solitude of a small plaza just south of the hippogryph master in Darnassus. Look for her there after you arrive.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Fidelio to purchase a flight to Darnassus, then bring the Dolanaar Recipe Book to Sister Aquinne in Darnassus.
QuestData.RewardText: Something for me? I wonder who sent it...
